pachd_address.description: A host:port pointing pachd at a pachyderm cluster.

server_cas.description: Trusted root certificates (overrides installed certificates), formatted as base64-encoded PEM

session_token.description: A secret token identifying the current pachctl user within their pachyderm cluster. This is included in all RPCs sent by pachctl, and used to determine if pachctl actions are authorized.

active_transaction.description: The currently active transaction for batching together pachctl commands. This can be set or cleared via many of the `pachctl * transaction` commands. This is the ID of the transaction object stored in the pachyderm etcd.

ConfigV1.title: Config V 1
ConfigV1.description: ConfigV1 specifies v1 of the pachyderm config (June 30 2017 - June 2019)
